channel.title: Fictional on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Fictional on ZooBerry

item.title: AGP - Armored Rhino
item.description: A mysterious armored rhino creature has been discovered in the lab, with no sign of Dr. Ricad.

item.title: AGP - Cotton the White Elephant
item.description: A genetically modified white elephant, affectionately named Cotton, was discovered in the abandoned Dr. Ricad’s Lab.

item.title: AGP - Fast Sheep
item.description: A genetically modified sheep discovered in Dr. Ricad’s Lab, providing key evidence in the mystery of Dr. Ricad’s disappearance.

item.title: AGP - Hulk the Wolf
item.description: A powerful genetically modified wolf, named The Hulk, was discovered in the lab trying to escape its cage.

item.title: Fictional
item.description: Animals that only exist in the depths our imaginations.

item.title: Jawa
item.description: Jawas are desert scavengers who live in clans, alternating between sandcrawlers and fortified homes for protection. This mod is a preview of the StarWars Expansion Pack (SWEP).

item.title: Moonwalking Giraffe
item.description: A whimsical giraffe that performs an impressive moonwalk, sure to amuse visitors.

item.title: Party Panda
item.description: A lively panda breed that loves music and dancing, bringing joy and energy to the exhibit.

item.title: Reinhorse
item.description: The Reinhorse is a majestic flying horse that captivates visitors with its grace and beauty.

item.title: Valentine Pack
item.description: A Valentine-themed pack featuring paths, balloons, a gazebo, animals, and more.

item.title: Eevee
item.description: Adorable Eevee for your zoo.

item.title: Fictional
item.description: Animals that only exist in the depths our imaginations.

item.title: Fire and Ice Unicorn
item.description: A fiery and icy unicorn duo for your zoo.

item.title: Party Tiger
item.description: A festive tiger with three color variations to celebrate ATW4.

item.title: Party Zebra
item.description: A festive addition to celebrate ATW4.

item.title: Pink Elephant
item.description: A pink elephant to brighten up your zoo.

item.title: Silver Eevee
item.description: Another Eevee variant for your zoo.

item.title: Umbreon and Blue Umbreon
item.description: A pair of interbreeding Pokemon species.

item.title: Blue and Gold Tiger
item.description: A striking blue and gold tiger.

item.title: Christmas Tiger
item.description: A seasonal tiger for winter exhibits.

item.title: Giant Charcoal Peacock
item.description: A peafowl variant with charcoal coloration.

item.title: King Kong II
item.description: A fictional animal for tropical rainforest exhibits.

item.title: Maltese Tiger
item.description: A fictional tiger with two unique variants.

item.title: Mightyena
item.description: A fictional animal based on a Pokémon character.

item.title: Fenris Wolf II
item.description: This dark, mythical wolf will frighten and amaze your guests, perfect for Halloween zoos.

item.title: King Kong
item.description: A giant fictional gorilla from Skull Island, with no gift items or donation mechanics.

item.title: European Unicorn
item.description: A medieval-style unicorn with biome-specific behavior and multiple skins.

item.title: Fenris Wolf
item.description: Fenrir’s descendants are larger than normal wolves and feature multiple skins.

item.title: Peryton
item.description: Add the Peryton, a mythical creature that is part deer and part bird, to your zoo.

item.title: Killer Penguin
item.description: Makes the Killer Penguin adoptable.

item.title: Yellow Jellyfish
item.description: Due to their extreme rarity, very little is known about the yellow jellyfish.

item.title: Extinctionless Dimension Pack
item.description: These three animals have been brought from the fictional Extinctionless Dimension to be adoptable in your zoo!

item.title: Fire Pack
item.description: From the hidden island of Drom emerges mythical beasts of fire.

item.title: Snowstalker
item.description: The Snowstalker is a species of mammal created for the film The Future is Wild. The Snowstalker is a saber-toothed mustelid, or weasel.

item.title: The Christmas Pack
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack is a collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: Winter Kirin
item.description: The Winter Kirin is labeled as Critically Endangered not because it is threatened, but because all traces of them disappear off the face of the planet after the month of December.

item.title: Blue Roo
item.description: The Blue Kangaroo live in Tasmania and Australia and is happy in many biomes.

item.title: Blue-backed Gorilla
item.description: Blue-Backed Gorillas, as they are usually called, live high in the Alps, in the rainforests.

item.title: Grimmace
item.description: This dark bear will be happy in any biome, even though Boreal is its main one.

item.title: Black Lion
item.description: A black coloration of the lion. This animal is recolored by Howling Shadow Wolf with coding by both Howling Shadow Wolf and Penguinman. I hope you enjoy it!

item.title: Phoenix
item.description: The phoenix was originally believed to be a myth, until a group of American scientists discovered a large flock several hundred miles south of Egypt.

item.title: Turkey Raptor
item.description: The Turkey Raptor is a festive dromaeosaurid that only appears once a year, on Thanksgiving.

item.title: Rainbow Hippos
item.description: An adorable pygmy hippo for every color of the rainbow!

item.title: Rainbow Hippos Part 2: NOT Rainbow Hippos
item.description: What comes after the colors of the rainbow? The colors of the not rainbow apparently.

item.title: zzzanimal
item.description: ZG8gbm90IGRvd25sb2FkIHRoaXMu

item.title: Unicorn
item.description: Today, Unicorns are mostly illustrated as white horses with a single horn on the forehead. But this is not correct. The best idea of the unicorn’s appearence can be found on gobelins.

item.title: Fantasy Wolf
item.description: These boreal forest wolves enjoy eating a variety of foods including bananas, berries, insects, fish, and meat.
